acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in POJOs with attributes containing wildcards
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillInPojosWithAttributesContainingWildcards

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ReadOnlyWildcardFieldsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type java.lang.Object@24be9868

Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type java.lang.Object@5fbd0979=java.lang.Object@7c060680 and value of type java.lang.Object@4988d5b0=java.lang.Object@4e80ba38
